description.zh: CERN 运营的开放研究数据仓库，为 ML 研究提供永久 DOI 和数据存档服务
description.en: Open research data repository operated by CERN, providing permanent DOI and data archival for ML research

authority_justification.zh: CERN 和 OpenAIRE 联合运营，欧盟资助，是学术数据存档的标准平台
authority_justification.en: Operated by CERN and OpenAIRE, EU funded, standard platform for academic data archival

access_method.doi: 每个数据集有永久 DOI
